name: Termination of custodianship
text:
[§553A-20]  Termination of custodianship.  The custodian shall transfer in an appropriate manner the custodial property to the minor or to the minor's estate upon the earlier of: 
     (1)  The minor's attainment of twenty-one years of age with respect to custodial property transferred under section 553A-4 or 553A-5; 
     (2)  The minor's attainment of age eighteen with respect to custodial property transferred under section 553A-6 or 553A-7; or 
     (3)  The minor's death. [L 1985, c 91, pt of §1]
